nodes.name: Set Data
nodes.notes: This set node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## How-To
1. Claim your free Namesilo API key here: {{ $env.API_BASE_URL }}

2. Set your API key and domains in "Set Data" node.

The workflow send up to 200 domains per loop until all domains are processed. The output is in Excel format.

Enjoy!

Note: Each loop wait 5min. This is required due to Namesilo rate limits.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Namesilo Bulk Domain Availability [Template]

## Overview
Automated workflow: Namesilo Bulk Domain Availability [Template]. This workflow integrates 9 different services: convertToFile, stickyNote, httpRequest, wait, code. It contains 13 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 13
- **Node Types**: 9
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Set Data**: set
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Convert & Split Domains**: code
- **Wait**: wait
- **Merge Results**: code
- **Loop Over Domains**: splitInBatches
- **Namesilo Requests**: httpRequest
- **Parse Data**: code
- **Convert to Excel**: convertToFile
- **Start**: manualTrigger
- ... and 3 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
